Params: {1: '1', 2: 'Pulao', 3: "Whoa! I know this! This... is a mystery box, isn't it?!", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Pulao', 3: 'I once had to buy six of them to get the finger puppet I wanted... Sob...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Pulao', 3: 'Now, let me give it a good shake... Hmm. Feels like something soft and fluffy.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Pulao opens the box, squinting as she finds a panda plushie dressed as the weaver girl inside. Unlike the perfectly made plushie itself, the dress looks hand-stitched.'}
{2: 'Pulao', 3: "Oh my god! That's so cute! Could this be a secret variant?!", 4: '1'}
{2: 'I think the maker must have made this by hand.', 3: '13'}
{2: 'Pulao', 3: "I hereby declare that this is the Limited Valentine's-Day-Exclusive Panda plushie! More importantly, it's a gift from Commandant!", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Yeah, this is the only one in the world.', 3: '15'}
{2: 'Pulao', 3: "Join our Valentine's Day celebration next year, Commandant! I also want to prepare a mystery box that will surprise you!", 4: '1'}
